profile_positions.description:
GTL Process Design Integration & Optimization May 2010-, Shell Projects & Technology
Lead Development of Process Synthesis Tool

Process synthesis (PS) is the selection, arrangement, and operation of processing and utility units so as to create an optimal process line-up to meet a desired Economic or Sustainable objective (e.g. Carbon or Energy Efficiency, Profit, NPV). PS determines the optimal structure, unit design and operating conditions through functional process modelling. 

When a performance objective (e.g maximize C-Efficiency) of the system is specified, the structure of the system and the performance of the units are not determined uniquely (degrees of freedom). Process synthesis drives the designers to search the solution space to find robust and optimized designs that meet the objectives.

( Key Publication http://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0098135411003425)
